transfer.description: Transfers `value` amount of tokens from the caller's account to `to` address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers `value` amount of tokens from `from` address to `to` address using the allowance mechanism.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with initial token details.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that `spender` is allowed to spend on behalf of `owner`.

approve.description: Sets `value` as the allowance of `spender` over the caller's tokens.

burn.description: Burns `amount` of tokens from `account`, reducing the total supply.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used in token representation.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

owner.description: Returns the current owner of the contract.

setDecimals.description: Sets a new number of decimals for the token.

setName.description: Sets a new name for the token.

setSymbol.description: Sets a new symbol for the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total number of tokens in circulation.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.
